classes.name: navigation--hover
classes.description: Container class to use hover behaviors

classes.name: navigation__container
classes.description: Class for a container for main items

classes.name: navigation__main-item
classes.description: Class for a main navigation item

classes.name: navigation__main-item--opened
classes.description: Class for styling an opened main item

classes.name: navigation__main-item--selected
classes.description: modifier class on the menu item when the item is selected

classes.name: navigation__main-item--fixed-bold
classes.description:
Class allowing for a main item to stay
the same width even when bolded. Uses the 'data-content' attribute to base its size

classes.name: navigation__main-item--overflow-arrows
classes.description: class wrapping the overflow trigger button that opens the menu

classes.name: navigation__main-item--overflow-arrows--selected
classes.description: modifier class on the menu arrow when the item is selected

classes.name: navigation__main-item--overflow-arrows-skinny
classes.description: class wrapping the overflow trigger button that opens the menu

classes.name: navigation__main-item--skinny
classes.description: modifier class for skinny navigation

classes.name: navigation__item-wrapper
classes.description: Wrapper for a navigation item and its menu panel

classes.name: navigation__chevron
classes.description: Class adding padding to a chevron

classes.name: navigation__item-icon
classes.description: an icon in a navigation item

classes.name: navigation__item-icon--secondary
classes.description: an icon for a secondary navigation item

classes.name: navigation__item-icon--large
classes.description: an icon with a larger size (24x24px)

classes.name: navigation__menu-panel
classes.description: Class for the sub menu panel

classes.name: navigation__menu-item
classes.description: Class for a navigation sub menu item

classes.name: navigation__megamenu-panel
classes.description: Class for the mega menu panel

classes.name: navigation__megamenu-panel
classes.description:
Class for a group of third level children in
mega menu

classes.name: navigation__megamenu-group
classes.description:
Class for a group of second level + third
level items in a mega menu

classes.name: navigation__megamenu-item
classes.description: a mega menu item

classes.name: navigation__megamenu-item--main
classes.description: a main megamenu item
